title: Strengthening Software Development Competencies: Public Health Competency-Based Innovator Training for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more types of emerging public health crisis cases and develop response strategies.
Learners can diagnose their practical competencies using competency-based assessment tools and create improvement plans.
Learners can plan public health projects using two or more mobile-accessible digital tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
